channel.title: content on DoKugo
channel.description: Recent content in content on DoKugo

item.title: Content Creation and Organization
item.description: Default Folders The basic idea is that your content folder has three subfolders: blog for blog articles, documentation for the content of several topics and projects for the description of projects. Each folder itself can contain other folders. For example, the project folder can have folders for a Raspberry Pi cluster project, a home cinema project and an art project. Each project folder can contain multiple articles written in Markdown.
